column1: The Pico do Itambé State Park (Portuguese: Parque Estadual do Pico do Itambé) is a state park in the state of Minas Gerais

== History ==
The Pico do Itambé State Park  was created by decree 39.398 of 21 January 1998.
It is administered by the Instituto Estadual de Florestas of Minas Gerais.
The park became part of the Espinhaço Mosaic of conservation units
== Environment ==
The park has a typical tropical climate with a dry season from June to August and a rainy season from November to March.
The highest parts of the Serra do Espinhaço have mild temperatures year round
